trans-unit.source: Provides the data portion of an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>.
This is a sealed class, so you can not inherit from it.
trans-unit.target: 이므로 클래스는 봉인된 클래스에서 상속할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Also, the constructor is private, so you cannot create a new instance of it.
trans-unit.target: 또한 생성자는 private의 새 인스턴스를 만들 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: An ImageListStreamer is returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageStream%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.

However, you cannot use this class to load images to an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> control by directly assigning the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageStream%2A> property from one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>직접 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageStream%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> 하나에서 속성</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageStream%2A> 을 지정 하 여 제어</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> 하는 이미지를 로드이 클래스를 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Instead you should directly assign one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> instance to another (for example, `ImageList2 = ImageList1)`.
trans-unit.target: 대신 직접 할당 해야 하나 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>다른 인스턴스 (예를 들어 `ImageList2 = ImageList1)`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 현재 인스턴스에서 사용 하는 모든 리소스를 해제는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>.
trans-unit.target: 호출 `Dispose` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer> 를 사용 하 여 작업을 마쳤으면

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer> in an unusable state.

After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 호출한 후 `Dispose`에 대 한 모든 참조를 해제 해야는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>가비지 수집기는 메모리를 회수할 수 있도록 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>차지한.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [관리 되지 않는 리소스 정리](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) 및 [Dispose 메서드를 구현](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 항상 호출 `Dispose` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer> 에 대 한 마지막 참조를 해제 하기 전에

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 사용 중인 리소스가 가비지 수집기 호출할 때까지 해제 되지 것입니다 그렇지 않은 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>개체의 `Finalize` 메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with the data needed to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: 정보를 표시 한 <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> 대상 개체를 직렬화 하는 데 필요한 데이터를 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information and a code example, see <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용 및 코드 예제를 보려면 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable?displayProperty=fullName> 를 참조 하세요.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that is the destination for this serialization.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> cannot be populated with data because no data exists, or it is not in the correct format.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> 데이터가 존재 하지 않거나 올바른 형식이 없기 때문에 데이터로 채울 수 없습니다.
